wikipedia_page.main: Edward 'Eddie' Forrest (born 17 December 1978 in Edinburgh) is a Scottish footballer who is currently without a club.

response: In 2003, Browne was accused of making a hoax call to Arbroath player Eddie Forrest, claiming to be the Chairman of Raith Rovers and offering a full-time contract. Forrest asked to be released from his contract with Arbroath, who then signed Browne as a replacement player. Browne claims a friend made the call, but Arbroath withdrew their contract as a result.
Edward or Eddie Forrest may refer to:
*Eddie Forrest (American football) (1921–2001), played two seasons with the San Francisco 49ers
